translated: It does not stand in the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics does not come from the three realms and does not stand in the three realms.🔽It does not stand in the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The emptiness of nonobservation does not come from the three realms and does not stand in the three realms.🔽It does not stand in the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The emptiness of the beginningless and endless does not come from the three realms and does not stand in the three realms.🔽It does not stand in the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The emptiness of that which is not to be discarded does not come from the three realms and does not stand in the three realms.🔽It does not stand in the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The emptiness of nature does not come from the three realms and does not stand in the three realms.🔽It does not stand in the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The emptiness of all things does not come from the three realms and does not stand in the three realms.🔽It does not stand in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor 'di ltar ming stong pa nyid ming stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di ltar ming stong pa nyid ming stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics does not come from the three realms and does not stand in the three realms.

original: mtshan ma stong pa nyid mtshan ma stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //🔽brda stong pa nyid brda stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //🔽tha snyad stong pa nyid ni tha snyad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshan ma stong pa nyid mtshan ma stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro // brda stong pa nyid brda stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro // tha snyad stong pa nyid ni tha snyad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the emptiness of defining characteristics is empty of the essential nature of the emptiness of defining characteristics.🔽because the emptiness of expression is empty of the essential nature of the emptiness of expression.

original: gdags pa stong pa nyid gdags pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gdags pa stong pa nyid gdags pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the emptiness of designation is empty of the essential nature of the emptiness of designation.

original: rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni skye ba med pa nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
analyzed: rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni skye ba med pa nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
translated: Subhūti, whoever wants to attain the unconditioned should want to attain the unarisen.

original: rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
analyzed: rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
translated: the unceased, the uncontaminated, the unpurified, and the unconditioned.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do //
analyzed: rab 'byor skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do //
translated: Subhūti, the intrinsic nature of the unarisen does not go forth from the three realms.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do //
translated: It does not stand in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do //
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba med do //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the unceased, the uncontaminated, the unpurified, and the unconditioned does not go forth from the three realms.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do //
translated: It does not stand in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor 'di ltar skye ba med pa ni skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di ltar skye ba med pa ni skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because nonproduction is empty of the intrinsic nature of nonproduction.

original: 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa de ni mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa de ni mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Nonstopping, nondefilement, nonpurification, and nonperformance are empty of the intrinsic nature of nonperformance.

original: rab 'byor de ltar rnam grangs 'dis ni 'di ltar theg pa chen po ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas par shes par bya ste /🔽theg pa de ni bskyod du med pa'o zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam la 'dzin pa'i rtog pa gnyis pa'i gnyen po yin no /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar rnam grangs 'dis ni 'di ltar theg pa chen po ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas par shes par bya ste / theg pa de ni bskyod du med pa'o zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam la 'dzin pa'i rtog pa gnyis pa'i gnyen po yin no /
translated: Subhūti, in this way, by this one of many explanations, you should know that the Great Vehicle, having gone forth from the three realms, stands in the knowledge of all aspects.🔽That vehicle is unshakable.

original: // / bam po bcu dgu pa /
analyzed: // / bam po bcu dgu pa /
translated: This is the antidote to the second conception of grasping on the path of seeing.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang khyod kyis gang 'di skad du theg pa chen po de gang du gnas par 'gyur zhes smras pa de ni theg pa chen po de @255a * //
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang khyod kyis gang 'di skad du theg pa chen po de gang du gnas par 'gyur zhes smras pa de ni theg pa chen po de @255a * //
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, you asked where the Great Vehicle will stand.

original: gang du 'ang gnas par 'gyur ba med de /
analyzed: gang du 'ang gnas par 'gyur ba med de /
translated: The Great Vehicle will stand nowhere at all.🔽And why?

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di lta ste /
translated: Because,

original: chos thams cad mi gnas pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad mi gnas pa ste /
translated: Subhūti, all phenomena do not stand.

original: rab 'byor 'on kyang theg pa che po de ni mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor 'on kyang theg pa che po de ni mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Subhūti, the Great Vehicle will stand in a manner of not standing.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no //🔽rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no // rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa ma yin /
translated: the realm of phenomena does not stand or not stand.

original: mi gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mi gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: Subhūti, the Great Vehicle does not stand or not stand in the same way.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni gnas pa ma yin /
translated: the unborn, unarisen, unceased, uncontaminated, unpurified, and unconditioned do not stand or not stand.

original: mi gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mi gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not non-abiding.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa ma yin mi gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa ma yin mi gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, this Great Vehicle does not stand or not stand.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ngo //
translated: Subhūti, the dharma-constituent is empty of the dharma-constituent.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Subhūti, the intrinsic nature of the dharma-constituent does not stand or not stand.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: Subhūti, the intrinsic nature of the dharma-constituent is empty of the intrinsic nature of the dharma-constituent.

original: de bzhin du ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pas stong ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pas stong ngo //
translated: In the same way, the unproduced, the unceased, the uncontaminated, the unpurified, and the uncompounded are empty of the uncompounded.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa ma yin /
translated: Subhūti, the nature of the absence of performance is not a state of rest,

original: mi gnas pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi gnas pa yang ma yin no //
translated: and it is not a non-state of rest.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: Subhūti, it is because the nature of the absence of performance is empty of the nature of the absence of performance.

original: rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni gang du yang mi gnas te /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni gang du yang mi gnas te /
translated: Subhūti, in this way that Great Vehicle does not stand anywhere,

original: gnas pa med pa'i tshul dang / g-yo ba med pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i lam la gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang po'i gnyen po yin no //
analyzed: gnas pa med pa'i tshul dang / g-yo ba med pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i lam la gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang po'i gnyen po yin no //
translated: and it does not stand in a way that is not a state of rest, and it does not stand in a way that is not a non-state of rest.

original: rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa des gang zhig nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa des gang zhig nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni /
translated: Subhūti, as for what you asked—‘What is the Great Vehicle that comes and goes and stands and sits?’

original: theg pa des gang yang nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: theg pa des gang yang nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba med do //
translated: Subhūti, that Great Vehicle does not come from anywhere, does not go anywhere, does not stand anywhere, and does not sit anywhere.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar theg pa de gang yin pa dang / gang nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med cing @255b mi dmigs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar theg pa de gang yin pa dang / gang nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med cing @255b mi dmigs pa'i phyir te /
translated: Subhūti, it is because all those dharmas—that vehicle, that which would go forth, that by which it would go forth, and that from which it would go forth—do not exist and are not apprehended.

original: de ltar chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs na chos gang zhig chos gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur /
analyzed: de ltar chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs na chos gang zhig chos gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur /
translated: “If all dharmas do not exist and are not apprehended, what dharma would go forth by means of what dharma?

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?🔽Subhūti, it is because a self is not apprehended, because a self is isolated, because a self is void, because a self is empty, because a self is essentially nonexistent.

original: rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar bdag mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa dang / sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar bdag mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa dang / sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang /
translated: Subhūti, it is because a self is purified by the transcendence of the extremes, and because a sentient being, a living being, a creature, one who lives, a human, a person, one born of Manu, a child of Manu,

original: byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag dmigs su med do //
analyzed: byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag dmigs su med do //
translated: a maker, a creator, an agent, an experiencer, one who knows, and one who sees are purified by the transcendence of the extremes.

original: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang /
translated: Because of being purified by transcending extremes, sentient beings, life, creatures, living beings, individuals, humankind, humans, agents, experiencers,

original: shes pa po dang / mthong ba po dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shes pa po dang / mthong ba po dmigs su med do //
translated: knowers, and seers are not apprehended.

original: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med do //
translated: Because of being purified by transcending extremes, the dharma-constituent is not apprehended.

original: de bzhin du mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa rnams dmigs su med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa rnams dmigs su med do //
translated: Similarly, because of being purified by transcending extremes, non-production, non-stopping, non-affliction, non-purification, and non-conditioning are not apprehended.

original: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams dmigs su med do //
translated: Because of being purified by transcending extremes, the aggregates, constituents, and sense fields are not apprehended.

original: mtha' las 'das pas rnam pa dag pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pas rnam pa dag pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dmigs su med do //
translated: Because of the purity of transcending limitations, dependent origination is non-apprehensible.

original: mtha' las 'das pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do //
translated: Because of the purity of transcending limitations, the transcendent perfection of generosity is non-apprehensible.

original: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do //🔽mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //🔽mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do // mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med do // mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //
translated: Because of the purity of transcending limitations, the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline, the transcendent perfection of tolerance, the transcendent perfection of perseverance, the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration, and the transcendent perfection of wisdom are non-apprehensible.🔽Because of the purity of transcending limitations, inner emptiness is non-apprehensible.🔽Because of the purity of transcending limitations, outer emptiness is non-apprehensible.

original: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //
translated: Because of the purity of transcending limitations, inner and outer emptiness is non-apprehensible.

original: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med do //🔽mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar @256a * //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med do // mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar @256a * //
translated: up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is non-apprehensible, owing to the extreme of non-existence.

original: gzhag pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: gzhag pa dmigs su med do //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are non-apprehensible, owing to the extreme of non-existence.

original: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med do //
translated: The right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, and path are non-apprehensible, owing to the extreme of non-existence.

original: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmigs su med do //
translated: The meditative stabilities and the formless [absorptions] are non-apprehensible, owing to the extreme of non-existence.

original: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs ba bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs ba bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs su med do //
translated: The ten powers of the Tathāgata, the four assurances, the four unhindered discernments, and the eighteen special qualities of the Buddha are non-apprehensible because of the purity of the transcendence of limits.

original: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa dmigs su med do //
translated: The stream enterer is non-apprehensible because of the purity of the transcendence of limits.

original: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba dmigs su med do //🔽mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba dmigs su med do // mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba dmigs su med do //
translated: The once-returner is non-apprehensible because of the purity of the transcendence of limits.🔽The non-returner is non-apprehensible because of the purity of the transcendence of limits.

original: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa nyid dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa nyid dmigs su med do //
translated: Arhatship is non-apprehensible because of the purity of the transcendence of limits.

original: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir rang sangs rgyas dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir rang sangs rgyas dmigs su med do //
translated: The pratyekabuddha is non-apprehensible because of the purity of the transcendence of limits.

original: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med do //
translated: The bodhisattva is non-apprehensible because of the purity of the transcendence of limits.

original: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dmigs su med do //
translated: The tathāgatas, arhats, genuinely perfect buddhas are non-apprehensible because of being utterly pure by nature.

original: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmigs su med do //
translated: The fruit of entering the stream is non-apprehensible because of being utterly pure by nature.

original: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmigs su med do //
translated: The fruit of being tied to one more rebirth is non-apprehensible because of being utterly pure by nature.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dmigs su med do //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dmigs su med do //
translated: The fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth is non-apprehensible because of being utterly pure by nature.🔽Arhatship is non-apprehensible because of being utterly pure by nature.🔽Individual enlightenment is non-apprehensible because of being utterly pure by nature.🔽The knowledge of path aspects is non-apprehensible because of being utterly pure by nature.

original: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs su med do //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is non-apprehensible because of being utterly pure by nature.

original: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir rab tu dga' ba'i sa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir rab tu dga' ba'i sa dmigs su med do //
translated: The level of the delightful is non-apprehensible because of being utterly pure by nature.

original: de bzhin du mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir dri ma med pa dang / 'od byed pa dang / 'od 'phro ba dang / sbyang dka' ba dang / @256b mngon du gyur pa dang / ring du song ba dang / mi g-yo ba dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir dri ma med pa dang / 'od byed pa dang / 'od 'phro ba dang / sbyang dka' ba dang / @256b mngon du gyur pa dang / ring du song ba dang / mi g-yo ba dang /

original: legs pa'i blo gros dang / chos kyi sprin dmigs su med do //
analyzed: legs pa'i blo gros dang / chos kyi sprin dmigs su med do //
translated: The four kinds of correct understanding are non-apprehensible, owing to their utter purity that transcends limitations.🔽The eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are non-apprehensible, owing to their utter purity that transcends limitations.

original: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir sngon gyi mtha' dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir sngon gyi mtha' dmigs su med do //
translated: The perfection of generosity is non-apprehensible, owing to its utter purity that transcends limitations.

original: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha' dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha' dmigs su med do //
translated: The perfection of ethical discipline is non-apprehensible, owing to its utter purity that transcends limitations.🔽The perfection of patience is non-apprehensible, owing to its utter purity that transcends limitations.🔽The perfection of diligence is non-apprehensible, owing to its utter purity that transcends limitations.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir sa dang po dmigs su med do //🔽nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa'i bar du dmigs su med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir sa dang po dmigs su med do // nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa'i bar du dmigs su med do //
translated: up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature, the first level is non-apprehensible,🔽up to the emptiness of internal phenomena, the tenth level is non-apprehensible,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir sa bcu pa'i bar du dmigs su med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir sa bcu pa'i bar du dmigs su med do //
translated: up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature, the tenth level is non-apprehensible.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽rab 'byor mtha' las @258a * //
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / rab 'byor mtha' las @258a * //
translated: If you ask why,

original: 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //🔽mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dmigs su med do //
analyzed: 'das pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro // mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dmigs su med do //
translated: Su­bhūti, it is because they are pure, beyond extremes.🔽If you apprehend that they are pure, beyond extremes, sentient beings to be trained are non-apprehensible, owing to the emptiness of internal phenomena.

original: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dmigs su med do //
translated: If you apprehend that they are pure, beyond extremes, sentient beings to be trained are non-apprehensible, owing to the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of intrinsic nature, and the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su med do //
translated: If you apprehend the purification that transcends limitations, you cannot apprehend the purification of the buddhafield because of the emptiness of internal phenomena.

original: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su med do //🔽mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig lnga dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su med do // mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig lnga dmigs su med do //
translated: If you apprehend the purification that transcends limitations, you cannot apprehend the purification of the buddhafield because of the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of inherent identity, and the emptiness of the non-existence of intrinsic identity.🔽If you apprehend the purification that transcends limitations, you cannot apprehend the five eyes because of the emptiness of internal phenomena.

original: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir mig lnga dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pas rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir mig lnga dmigs su med do //
translated: If you apprehend the purification that transcends limitations, you cannot apprehend the five eyes because of the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of inherent identity, and the emptiness of the non-existence of intrinsic identity.

original: rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro
translated: In this way, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom, by way of not apprehending all dharmas, go forth to the knowledge of all aspects by means of the Great Vehicle.

original: zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i lam la 'dzin pa'i rtog pa gnyis pa'i gnyen po yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i lam la 'dzin pa'i rtog pa gnyis pa'i gnyen po yin no //
translated: This is the antidote to the second conception of grasping on the path of meditation.

original: de dag gis ni tshogs kyi bsgrub pa bstan to //
analyzed: de dag gis ni tshogs kyi bsgrub pa bstan to //
translated: Those explain the accomplishment of the collection.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti said to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung bar 'gyur ba de'i slad du theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung bar 'gyur ba de'i slad du theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o //
translated: “Lord, this ‘Great Vehicle,’ this ‘Great Vehicle’—it is called ‘Great Vehicle’ because it surpasses the world with its gods, humans, and asuras and goes forth.

original: bcom ldan 'das theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: Lord, that vehicle is equal to space.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: Blessed One, it is as follows:

original: nam mkha' sems can gzhal du med pa /
analyzed: nam mkha' sems can gzhal du med pa /
translated: Space makes room for innumerable,🔽incalculable, immeasurable sentient beings.

original: grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa'i go 'byed pa de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di yang sems can gzhal du ma mchis /🔽grangs ma mchis /
analyzed: grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa'i go 'byed pa de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di yang sems can gzhal du ma mchis / grangs ma mchis /
translated: In the same way, this Great Vehicle makes room for innumerable,

original: tshad ma mchis pa'i go 'byed de /
analyzed: tshad ma mchis pa'i go 'byed de /
translated: incalculable, immeasurable sentient beings.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po lags so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po lags so //
translated: Blessed One, for this reason, the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings is called ‘great.’

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: Blessed One, it is as follows:

original: nam mkha' la 'gro ba mi mthong /
analyzed: nam mkha' la 'gro ba mi mthong /
translated: One does not see space going,

original: 'ong ba dang @258b gnas pa yang mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'ong ba dang @258b gnas pa yang mi mthong ngo //
translated: coming, or staying.

original: de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di la yang 'gro ba mi dmigs /
analyzed: de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di la yang 'gro ba mi dmigs /
translated: In the same way, in this Great Vehicle, one does not apprehend going,

original: 'ong ba mi dmigs /
analyzed: 'ong ba mi dmigs /
translated: one does not apprehend coming,

original: gnas pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gnas pa mi dmigs so //
translated: and one does not apprehend staying.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na /🔽nam mkha' ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na / nam mkha' ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: Blessed One, it is as follows:🔽Space is not apprehended in the past,🔽not apprehended in the future,

original: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: and not apprehended in the present.

original: dbus mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dbus mi dmigs so //
translated: the middle is not observed.

original: de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di yang dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di yang dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: Similarly, this Great Vehicle, because of the sameness of the three times, is not observed in the past,

original: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: is not observed in the future,

original: dbus mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dbus mi dmigs so //
translated: and the middle is not observed.

original: de ltar na 'di ni theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o //
analyzed: de ltar na 'di ni theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o //
translated: Thus, this is called the Great Vehicle, the Great Vehicle.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor de de bzhin no //
translated: “Subhūti, it is so!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is just so!

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po gang yin pa 'di dag ni /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po gang yin pa 'di dag ni /
translated: These six perfections

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ste /
translated: are the Great Vehicle of bodhisattva great beings.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: They are the perfection of giving, the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the Bodhisattva-Mahāsattva’s Great Vehicle.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, the Bodhisattva-Mahāsattva’s Great Vehicle is as follows:

original: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad de /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad de /
translated: all the dhāraṇī gateways and all the samādhi gateways.

original: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar du ste /
analyzed: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar du ste /
translated: It is the Heroic Progress Samādhi, up to the Space-like Unattached Liberation Unbound Samādhi.

original: rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, this is called the Bodhisattva-Mahāsattva’s Great Vehicle.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, the Bodhisattva-Mahāsattva’s Great Vehicle is as follows:

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ste /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ste /
translated: it is inner emptiness, up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the Bodhisattva great beings’ Great Vehicle.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po mi 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po mi 'di lta ste /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the Bodhisattva great beings’ Great Vehicle is this:

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
translated: the four establishments of mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four legs of magical power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven limbs of awakening, the eightfold noble path,

original: bsam gtan @259a * //
analyzed: bsam gtan @259a * //
translated: the four concentrations,

original: bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste /
analyzed: bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste /
translated: the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the ten tathāgata powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: This is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa chen po de ni lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa chen po de ni lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, you said, ‘The Great Vehicle outshines and goes beyond the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.

original: zhes smras pa ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang zhe na /
analyzed: zhes smras pa ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang zhe na /
translated: ’ What is the world with its gods, humans, and asuras?

original: 'di lta ste 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams te /
analyzed: 'di lta ste 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams te /
translated: It is the world of the desire realm, the world of the form realm, and the world of the formless realm.

original: rab 'byor gal te 'dod pa'i khams de bzhin nyid du gyur cing ma nor ba de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor gal te 'dod pa'i khams de bzhin nyid du gyur cing ma nor ba de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid yin te /
translated: Subhūti, if the desire realm were suchness, unmistaken suchness, not another suchness,

original: phyin ci ma log pa yang dag pa de kho na ji lta ba bzhin yin zhing rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin te /
analyzed: phyin ci ma log pa yang dag pa de kho na ji lta ba bzhin yin zhing rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin te /
translated: unchanging suchness, and real suchness, just as it is, and were a thing that is permanent, stable, eternal, and unchanging,

original: dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: If it were not a non-entity, this Great Vehicle would not overpower and attain emancipation from the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.

original: rab 'byor 'on kyang 'dod pa'i khams de rnam par brtags pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'on kyang 'dod pa'i khams de rnam par brtags pa /
translated: However, Subhūti, the desire realm is merely imagined,

original: rnam par bsgrubs pa /
analyzed: rnam par bsgrubs pa /
translated: constructed, and demonstrated.

original: kun tu bstan pa tsam ji lta ba bzhin ma yin zhing 'di thams cad mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te /
analyzed: kun tu bstan pa tsam ji lta ba bzhin ma yin zhing 'di thams cad mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te /
translated: It is not as it is. All of this is impermanent, unstable, not eternal, and subject to change.

original: dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no //
translated: Since it is a non-entity, therefore this Great Vehicle overpowers and attains emancipation from the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.

original: rab 'byor gal te gzugs kyi khams de bzhin nyid du 'gyur zhing ma nor ba de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor gal te gzugs kyi khams de bzhin nyid du 'gyur zhing ma nor ba de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ma yin te /
translated: Subhūti, if the form realm were suchness, unmistaken suchness, not another suchness,

original: phyin ci ma log pa yang yang dag pa de kho na ji lta ba bzhin yin zhing rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin te /
analyzed: phyin ci ma log pa yang yang dag pa de kho na ji lta ba bzhin yin zhing rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin te /
translated: It is the unmistaken, the real, the just, the as-it-is, the permanent, the stable, the enduring, the changeless reality.

original: dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: If it were not so, this Great Vehicle would not surpass and go beyond the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.

original: rab 'byor 'on kyang gzugs kyi khams de rnam par brtags pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'on kyang gzugs kyi khams de rnam par brtags pa /
translated: But, Subhūti, the form element is just an imputation,

original: rnam par bsgrubs pa kun tu bsdan  pa tsam @259b ji lta ba bzhin ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par bsgrubs pa kun tu bsdan  pa tsam @259b ji lta ba bzhin ma yin te /
translated: a designation, a fiction, not the way things are.

original: 'di thams cad ni mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin /
analyzed: 'di thams cad ni mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin /
translated: All of this is impermanent, unstable, not enduring,

original: 'gyur ba'i chos can te /
analyzed: 'gyur ba'i chos can te /
translated: but subject to change.

original: dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no //
translated: Since it is not a reality, this Great Vehicle surpasses and goes beyond the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.

original: rab 'byor gal te gzugs med pa'i khams de bzhin nyid du gyur cing ma nor ba de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid yin te /
